title: Enhanced crystal network and charge transfer of non-fused ring electron acceptor via interchain interaction enable efficient and stable organic solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02027H, Paper
Shounuan Ye, Tianyi Chen, Jinyang Yu, Shanlu Wang, Shuixing Li, Jingxi Wang, Yuang Fu, Yuxuan Zhu, Mengting Wang, Xinhui Lu, Zaifei Ma, Chang-Zhi Li, Minmin Shi, Hongzheng Chen
Non-fused ring electron acceptors (NFREAs) are regarded as the alternative materials for low-cost organic solar cells (OSCs), but their power conversion efficiencies (PCEs) lag behind those of fused ring counterparts....
